ezvcard.util

Class ClearableStringBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ezvcard.util.ClearableStringBuilder

  • public class ClearableStringBuilder
extends Object
    Wraps a StringBuilder object, providing utility methods for clearing it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClearableStringBuilder()

      Appends a character array to the buffer.
      ClearableStringBuilder append(CharSequence string)
      Appends a character sequence to the buffer.
      ClearableStringBuilder chop()
      Removes the last character from the buffer.
      ClearableStringBuilder clear()
      Clears the buffer.
      String get()
      Gets the buffer's contents.
      String getAndClear()
      Gets the buffer's contents, then clears it.
      int length()
      Gets the length of the buffer.
